医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
实验性无线起搏器从心脏收集能量为电池充电根据将于 2023 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的一项原理验证研究，通过将机械能转换为电能，实验性无线或无引线起搏器外壳能够对其电池进行部分充电。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Experimental-wireless-pacemaker-harvests-energy-from-heart-to-recharge-battery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Experimental-wireless-pacemaker-harvests-energy-from-heart-to-recharge-battery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed6c2c79-8109-42e4-8cdd-713c65d735b8 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 09:36:25 -0500 Experimental wireless pacemaker harvests energy from heart to recharge battery
人工智能可以彻底改变心源性猝死的预测和预防根据即将在美国心脏大会上发表的初步研究，通过人工智能 (AI) 可以预测心源性猝死，甚至解决一个人的风险以防止未来死亡，并且可以为预防和全球健康策略提供新的举措2023 年协会复苏科学研讨会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-could-revolutionize-sudden-cardiac-death-prediction-and-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-could-revolutionize-sudden-cardiac-death-prediction-and-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4da33fb0-d0f3-4324-95f1-4dc07a071401 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 09:28:27 -0500 AI could revolutionize sudden cardiac death prediction and prevention
经常吸食大麻可能会增加心力衰竭、中风或心脏病发作的风险根据将在美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的两项初步研究，即使考虑了 2 型糖尿病、高血压和肥胖等其他心血管危险因素，经常吸食大麻也可能会增加心力衰竭、中风或心脏病发作的风险2023 年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Regular-marijuana-use-may-raise-the-risk-for-heart-failure-中风-or-heart-attack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Regular-marijuana-use-may-raise-the-risk-for-heart-failure-中风-or-heart-attack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=978a1395-ad8f-4b25-a0cb-a853cd7395bc Mon, 06 Nov 2023 09:20:56 -0500 Regular marijuana use may raise the risk for heart failure, stroke or heart attack
抑郁、焦虑和慢性压力会增加心脏和大脑健康并发症的风险根据将于 2023 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的两项初步研究，心脏和思想密切相关，抑郁、焦虑和慢性压力都会增加心脏和大脑健康并发症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Depression-anxiety-and-chronic-stress-increase-risk-for-heart-and-brain-health-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Depression-anxiety-and-chronic-stress-increase-risk-for-heart-and-brain-health-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a4d17a4-ff68-4b92-84f6-c2ccc59e547b Mon, 06 Nov 2023 09:01:51 -0500 Depression, anxiety and chronic stress increase risk for heart and brain health complications
有中风史的女性担心急诊护理中存在偏见密歇根医学院和布朗大学领导的一项研究发现，中风后幸存的女性认为，根据性别、种族或民族，她们不太可能获得足够的紧急护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Women-with-中风-history-fear-bias-in-emergency-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Women-with-中风-history-fear-bias-in-emergency-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68caf3cd-c155-4812-a6d2-c91fa15052d0 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 08:52:15 -0500 Women with stroke history fear bias in emergency care
人工智能工具可能有效检测心脏瓣膜疾病和预测心血管风险根据将于 2023 年美国心脏协会科学会议上发表的两项研究的初步研究，人工智能的进步使得人工智能工具的开发和应用成为可能，这些工具可能有效地检测心脏瓣膜疾病并预测心血管疾病事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-tools-may-be- effective-at-detecting-heart-valvular-disease-and-predicting-cardioangio-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-tools-may-be- effective-at-detecting-heart-valvular-disease-and-predicting-cardioangio-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9696b6a1-940d-4886-b0d5-abd5271c7b17 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 08:47:55 -0500 AI tools may be effective at detecting heart valvular disease and predicting cardiovascular risk
TIMP2 蛋白被认为是大脑可塑性和记忆的关键参与者研究人员探索了成人大脑海马细胞外基质 (ECM) 中金属蛋白酶组织抑制剂 2 (TIMP2) 调节的分子和细胞过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/TIMP2- Protein-identified-as-key-player-in-brain- Plasticity-and-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/TIMP2- Protein-identified-as-key-player-in-brain- Plasticity-and-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85bb5ce8-7973-4179-8d0f-446d40b3144b Mon, 06 Nov 2023 08:27:00 -0500 TIMP2 protein identified as key player in brain plasticity and memory
研究揭示了青少年抑郁症和抗抑郁药处方的季节性趋势研究人员确定了居住在英国英格兰的青少年和年轻人初级保健抗抑郁药处方和心理健康问题咨询的季节性模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-sheds-light-on-seasonal-trends-in-adolescent-depression-and-antidepressant-prescribing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-sheds-light-on-seasonal-trends-in-adolescent-depression-and-antidepressant-prescribing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2dbcb57-488f-4412-9408-eddc9039739f Mon, 06 Nov 2023 07:48:00 -0500 Study sheds light on seasonal trends in adolescent depression and antidepressant prescribing
在家工作：COVID-19 期间对父母的健康有利有弊？ 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行期间远程办公对父母的总体健康和心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Work-from-home-a-mixed-blessing-for-parents-health-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Work-from-home-a-mixed-blessing-for-parents-health-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c5902b1-cfd9-4e63-a617-40b29374b582 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 06:48:00 -0500 Work from home: a mixed blessing for parents' health during COVID-19?
机器学习为尿路感染治疗中的精准医疗铺平了道路机器学习 (ML) 算法可预测复杂尿路感染的抗生素耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Machine-learning-paves-the-way-for- precision-medicine-in-UTI-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Machine-learning-paves-the-way-for- precision-medicine-in-UTI-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d78d0ec-4e70-40a0-a0f9-1f271cac4620 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 06:24:00 -0500 Machine learning paves the way for precision medicine in UTI treatments
